Sales

Sales module provides the order management functionality. It provides the functionality needed to store order in the database, as well as it provides plugins to hook into system. The functionality is obtained through the Zed Administrative Interface that renders orders with orders details and the client API to get customer orders.

 

Latest version: 8.16.2 View on GitHub
Last update: 19 Nov 2018
 
  Type: Core Splitted
Group: Functional

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
saveComment

  • Adds username to comment

  • Saves comment to database
getDistinctOrderStates

  • Returns the distinct states of all order items for the given order id
getOrderCommentsByIdSalesOrder

  • Returns all comments for the given order id
saveOrder

  • Saves order and items to database

  • Sets "is test" flag

  • Updates checkout response with saved order data

  • Sets initial state for state machine
saveSalesOrder

  • Saves order and items to database

  • Sets "is test" flag

  • Updates checkout response with saved order data

  • Sets initial state for state machine
updateOrder

  • Update sales order with data from order transfer

  • Returns true if order was successfully updated
updateOrderAddress

  • Replaces all values of the order address by the values from the addresses transfer

  • Returns true if order was successfully updated
getCustomerOrders

Returns a list of of orders for the given customer id and (optional) filters.
getPaginatedCustomerOrders

  • Returns a list of of orders for the given customer id and (optional) filters.

  • Aggregates order totals calls -> SalesAggregator

  • Paginates order list for limited result
getPaginatedCustomerOrdersOverview

  • Returns a list of of orders for the given customer id and (optional) filters, without order items information.

  • Aggregates order totals calls -> SalesAggregator

  • Paginates order list for limited result
getCustomerOrder

  • Returns the order for the given customer id and sales order id.

  • Aggregates order totals calls -> SalesAggregator
getOrderByIdSalesOrder

  • Returns the order for the given sales order id.
findOrderByIdSalesOrder

  • Returns the order for the given sales order id.
findOrderByIdSalesOrderItem

  • Returns the order for the given sales order item id.
getCustomerOrderByOrderReference

  • Gets hydrated OrderTransfer by given order reference and customer reference.

  • OrderTransfer must have customerReference and orderReference, otherwise method fails.

  • Returns empty OrderTransfer if order entity not found in the database.
expandSalesOrder

  • Transforms provided cart items according configured cart item transformer strategies.

  • If no cart item transformer strategy is configured, explodes the provided items per quantity.

  • Recalculates order transfer with new values.
createSalesExpense

  • Creates sales expense entity from transfer object.

  • Adds sales expense to sales order.

Clients

Client Method Description
getOrders

  • Returns the sales orders for the given customer and filters.
getPaginatedOrder

  • Returns the sales orders for the given customer and filters.
getPaginatedCustomerOrdersOverview

  • Returns a list of of orders for the given customer id and (optional) filters, without order items information.

  • Aggregates order totals calls -> SalesAggregator

  • Paginates order list for limited result
getOrderDetails

  • Returns details for the given order id.
getCustomerOrderByOrderReference

  • Returns the order for the given order reference.

  • OrderTransfer should have the customerReference and orderReference set.

Plugins

Plugin Method Description
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Sales/​Dependency/​Plugin/​OrderExpanderPreSavePluginInterface.php expand

  • Its a plugin which hydrates SpySalesOrderEntityTransfer before order created
/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Sales/​Dependency/​Plugin/​HydrateOrderPluginInterface.php hydrate

  • Its a plugin which hydrates OrderTransfer when order read is persistence,

  • Can be used to add additional data to OrderTransfer

Dependencies:

  • PHP >=7.1
  • Calculation ^4.0.0
  • Country ^3.0.0
  • Customer ^6.0.0 || ^7.0.0
  • Gui ^3.7.0
  • Kernel ^3.17.0
  • Locale ^3.0.0
  • Money ^2.0.0
  • Oms ^7.3.0 || ^8.0.0
  • Propel ^3.0.0
  • PropelOrm ^1.0.0
  • SalesExtension ^1.1.0
  • SalesSplit ^3.0.0
  • SequenceNumber ^3.0.0
  • Symfony ^3.0.0
  • User ^3.0.0
  • UtilDateTime ^1.0.0
  • UtilSanitize ^2.0.0
  • UtilText ^1.1.0
  • ZedRequest ^3.0.0

Suggested Installations:

  • Checkout If you want to use Checkout plugins. ^4.0.0

 8.13.1

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
saveComment

  • Adds username to comment

  • Saves comment to database
getDistinctOrderStates

  • Returns the distinct states of all order items for the given order id
getOrderCommentsByIdSalesOrder

  • Returns all comments for the given order id
saveOrder

  • Saves order and items to database

  • Sets "is test" flag

  • Updates checkout response with saved order data

  • Sets initial state for state machine
saveSalesOrder

  • Saves order and items to database

  • Sets "is test" flag

  • Updates checkout response with saved order data

  • Sets initial state for state machine
updateOrder

  • Update sales order with data from order transfer

  • Returns true if order was successfully updated
updateOrderAddress

  • Replaces all values of the order address by the values from the addresses transfer

  • Returns true if order was successfully updated
getCustomerOrders

Returns a list of of orders for the given customer id and (optional) filters.
getPaginatedCustomerOrders

  • Returns a list of of orders for the given customer id and (optional) filters.

  • Aggregates order totals calls -> SalesAggregator

  • Paginates order list for limited result
getCustomerOrder

  • Returns the order for the given customer id and sales order id.

  • Aggregates order totals calls -> SalesAggregator
getOrderByIdSalesOrder

  • Returns the order for the given sales oder id.
findOrderByIdSalesOrderItem

  • Returns the order for the given sales order item id.
getCustomerOrderByOrderReference

  • Gets hydrated OrderTransfer by given order reference and customer reference.

  • OrderTransfer must have customerReference and orderReference, otherwise method fails.

  • Returns empty OrderTransfer if order entity not found in the database.
expandSalesOrder

  • Transforms provided cart items according configured cart item transformer strategies.

  • If no cart item transformer strategy is configured, explodes the provided items per quantity.

  • Recalculates order transfer with new values.

Clients

Client Method Description
getOrders

  • Returns the sales orders for the given customer and filters.
getPaginatedOrder

  • Returns the sales orders for the given customer and filters.
getOrderDetails

  • Returns details for the given order id.
getCustomerOrderByOrderReference

  • Returns the order for the given order reference.

  • OrderTransfer should have the customerReference and orderReference set.

/​src/​Spryker/​Zed/​Sales/​Dependency/​Plugin/​HydrateOrderPluginInterface.php hydrate

  • Its a plugin which hydrates OrderTransfer when order read is persistence,

  • Can be used to add additional data to OrderTransfer

  • Paginates order list for limited result

  • Aggregates order totals calls -> SalesAggregator

  • Returns the order for the given sales oder id.

  • Returns the order for the given sales order item id.
expandSalesOrder

  • Expands order by quantity 1 recalculates order transfer with new values

 8.4.1

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
saveComment

  • Adds username to comment

  • Saves comment to database
getDistinctOrderStates

  • Returns the distinct states of all order items for the given order id
getOrderCommentsByIdSalesOrder

  • Returns all comments for the given order id
saveOrder

  • Saves order and items to database

  • Sets "is test" flag

  • Updates checkout response with saved order data

  • Sets initial state for state machine
saveSalesOrder

  • Saves order and items to database

  • Sets "is test" flag

  • Updates checkout response with saved order data

  • Sets initial state for state machine
updateOrder

  • Update sales order with data from order transfer

  • Returns true if order was successfully updated
updateOrderAddress

  • Replaces all values of the order address by the values from the addresses transfer

  • Returns true if order was successfully updated
getCustomerOrders

Returns a list of of orders for the given customer id and (optional) filters.
getCustomerOrder

  • Returns the order for the given customer id and sales order id.

  • Aggregates order totals calls -> SalesAggregator
getOrderByIdSalesOrder

  • Returns the order for the given sales oder id.
expandSalesOrder

  • Expands order by quantity 1 recalculates order transfer with new values

Clients

Client Method Description
getOrders

Returns the sales orders for the given customer and filters
getOrderDetails

Returns details for the given order id

  • Replaces all values of the order address by the values from the addresses transfer

  • Returns the order for the given sales oder id.

  • Expands order by quantity 1 recalculates order transfer with new values

 5.1.1

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
saveComment

  • Adds username to comment

  • Saves comment to database
getDistinctOrderStates

  • Returns the distinct states of all order items for the given order id
getOrderCommentsByIdSalesOrder

  • Returns all comments for the given order id
saveOrder

  • Saves order and items to database

  • Sets "is test" flag

  • Updates checkout response with saved order data

  • Sets initial state for state machine
updateOrder

  • Update sales order with data from order transfer

  • Returns true if order was successfully updated
updateOrderAddress

  • Replaces all values of the order address by the values from the addresses transfer

  • Returns true if order was successfully updated
getCustomerOrders

Returns a list of of orders for the given customer id and (optional) filters.
getCustomerOrder

  • Returns the order for the given customer id and sales order id.

  • Aggregates order totals calls -> SalesAggregator
getOrderByIdSalesOrder

  • Returns the order for the given sales oder id.

Clients

Client Method Description
getOrders

Returns the sales orders for the given customer and filters
getOrderDetails

Returns details for the given order id

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
saveComment

  • Add username to comment

  • Save comment to database
getDistinctOrderStates

  • Return the distinct states of all order items for the given order id
getOrderCommentsByIdSalesOrder

  • Return all comments for the given order id
saveOrder

  • Save order and items to database

  • Set "is test" flag

  • update checkout response with saved order data
updateOrder

  • Update sales order with data from order transfer

  • Returns true if order was successfully updated
updateOrderAddress

  • Replaces all values of the order address by the values from the addresses transfer

  • Returns true if order was successfully updated
getCustomerOrders

Returns a list of of orders for the given customer id and (optional) filters.
getOrderByIdSalesOrder

  • Returns persisted order information stored into OrderTransfer

  • Aggregates order totals calls -> SalesAggregator

Suggested Installations:

 2.0.3

API (Facades)

Facade Method Description
saveComment

  • Add username to comment

  • Save comment to database
getDistinctOrderStates

  • Return the distinct states of all order items for the given order id
getOrderCommentsByIdSalesOrder

  • Return all comments for the given order id
saveOrder

  • Save order and items to database

  • Set "is test" flag

  • update checkout response with saved order data
updateOrder

  • Update sales order with data from order transfer

  • Returns true if order was successfully updated
updateOrderAddress

  • Replaces all values of the order address by the values from the addresses transfer

  • Returns true if order was successfully updated
getCustomerOrders

Returns a list of of orders for the given customer id and (optional) filters.
getOrderByIdSalesOrder

  • Returns persisted order information stored into OrderTransfer

  • Aggregates order totals calls -> SalesAggregator

Clients

Client Method Description
getOrders

Returns the sales orders for the given customer and filters
getOrderDetails

Returns details for the given order id
